channel.title: Agressive Cats [pi] HELP ++rep
channel.description:
Hey guys, Ive added summoning cats to my server and it works perfectly The only thing is it has attacked me when i dropped it. Any clues on how to fix?
Things ive looked for already - Nothing in the isAggressive method...
I think it could be because ive added my other method for spawning them in a agressive place or attack section??
